author: yutazzz
title: Introducing 100 Cardano Defi in JP
description: Cardano的大部分Defi都是英文的。日本人持有的ADA是巨大的。有必要鼓励日本人的参与。

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal has outlined a problem which fits in the challenge but failed to describe a clear solution. I didn't see any mention of what is actually being built, which for me, is a real issue as I don't have any repair to judge the impact of this proposal. Furthermore the proposer didn't mention how the proposal will add value to the cardano ecosystem. Clearly, this proposal needs to be improved by stating the solution in a precise way. Failing to do so can easily invalidate the feasibility and auditability of this proposal.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer did not specify clearly what he is trying to build. I think that the proposer should try to improve this proposal by being more specific on the solution. Furthermore I can't identify any roadmap or milestones in this proposal which is another room for improvement in this proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: This proposal will not likely be auditable as it lacks a basic roadmap with comprehensible milestones. I think that the proposer should focus on providing a better description of what he is trying to build. Failing to do so will make the evaluation of this project hard for anyone. There is a lot of room for improvement for this proposal.

f6_assessments.q0:
Successfully solving this problem will make a huge impact to Cardano ecosystem, and solving it also one of the most important thing must be done because it make fair to Japanese that is 95% presales buyers. 
The proposal show shortly but clear enough the way that they will solve it in next 6 months. 
Moreover, it also shows detailed info about how it strongly impact and important to Cardano ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1:
The detail things to do is very clear on actions and materials will be published, so that the budget it required is detailed clearly and reasonable. Also, it's a piece of their 4 overacrching proposals that all attached. 
This is a simple task but they also write down very clear about what they will do, and also some risk that they can control in the feasibility season.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposal have very detail information about what it will do with realistic timeline for its scope of work. KPI is also very detail and clear for auditing. 
It also provide very detail to explain about the problem it have to solve and we can easy to understand how it can solve them. 
So, these info is completely enough for help audting this proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal addresses the challenge to scale-up Cardano community since the Japanese is holding a huge amount of ADA but language barrier and technical knowledge barrier. 100 Defi well presented in Japanese language will benefit this this community, especially for new-comers.
f6_assessments.q1: Since the development plan, the team and budget is so simple but clear and reasonable. I think this proposal will be implemented successfully. $1500 total cost for 100 defi with videos for Japanese community is worth it.
f6_assessments.q2: This proposal provides me sufficient information to audit. Roadmap is specific with milestones and KPIs is 100 clearly on the title of proposal.

solution: 用日语简单介绍100个，详细介绍10个关于Defi的情况。
